name: FE Universe - FIWARE Notarization
info:
Il programma scrive sul Context Broker
Orion LD i risultati dei test immessi.

Al riavvio  programmato per annullare
tutte le sottoscrizioni al Context Broker,
e mantenerne solo quella al servizio
di notarizzazione su Blockchain. 

Per imostazione predefinita, notarizza
su Blockchain Ethereum (testnet Goerli)
solo gli Acceptance Test con un codice
risultato pari a 100 o 200.

Inserire la URL del Context Broker Orion
nel flow "FIWARE", e a URL di Node-RED
attualmente sul browser nella scheda
Notification dei nodi Subscribe.

name: get flow.File
extract file
get flow.File
chart data
set flow.Dir&Hidden
table data
form data
upload
format:
<body>
<button class="md-raised md-button md-ink-ripple" onclick="importData()">Upload</button>    

<script>
let restoreScope = scope;

function importData() {
  let input = document.createElement('input');
  input.type = 'file';
  input.id = 'restoreBtn';
  input.onchange = _ => {
    // you can use this method to get file and perform respective operations
        let fReader = new FileReader();
        fReader.readAsArrayBuffer(input.files[0]);
        fReader.onloadend = function(event){
        restoreScope.send({
            file:{name:input.files[0].name},
            payload:event.target.result
          });}
        };
  input.click();
}
</script>
</body>

msg.payload = {       
    arch:         os.arch(),
    cpus:         os.cpus(),
    cpu_model:    os.cpus()[os.cpus().length - 1].model,
    cpu_speed:    os.cpus()[os.cpus().length - 1].speed,
    n_cpus:       os.cpus().length,
    endianness:   os.endianness(),
    homedir:      os.homedir(),
    hostname:     os.hostname(),
    network:      os.networkInterfaces(),
    address:      os.networkInterfaces().eth0[0].address,
    platform:     os.platform(),
    release:      os.release(),
    type:         os.type(),
    userInfo:     os.userInfo(),
    gid:          os.userInfo().gid,
    uid:          os.userInfo().uid,
    username:     os.userInfo().username,
    shell:        os.userInfo().shell,
    os_version:   os.version(),

    cwd:          process.cwd(),
    node_version: process.version,

    last_update:  new Date()
}
return msg;

name: SUBSCRIBE (LD)
info:
- [Subscriptions](https://github.com/FIWARE/tutorials.Subscriptions/tree/NGSI-LD)

NGSI-LD Query Language, clause 4.9
```
Query = (QueryTerm / QueryTermAssoc) *(LogicalOp (QueryTerm / QueryTermAssoc))
QueryTermAssoc = %x28 QueryTerm *(LogicalOp QueryTerm) %x29 ; (QueryTerm)
QueryTerm = Attribute
QueryTerm =/ Attribute Operator ComparableValue
QueryTerm =/ Attribute equal CompEqualityValue
QueryTerm =/ Attribute unequal CompEqualityValue
QueryTerm =/ Attribute patternOp RegExp
QueryTerm =/ Attribute notPatternOp RegExp
DottedPath = AttrName *(%x2E AttrName) ; AttrName *(.AttrName)
Attribute = DottedPath *1(%x5B DottedPath %x5D) ; DottedPath *1([DottedPath])
Operator = equal / unequal / greaterEq / greater / lessEq / less
ComparableValue = Number / quotedStr / dateTime / date / time
OtherValue = false / true
Value = ComparableValue / OtherValue
Range = ComparableValue dots ComparableValue
ValueList = Value 1*(%x2C Value) ; Value 1*(, Value)
CompEqualityValue = OtherValue / ValueList / Range / URI
equal = %x3D %x3D ; ==
unequal = %x21 %x3D ; !=
greater = %x3E ; >
greaterEq = %x3E %x3D ; >=
less = %x3C ; <
lessEq = %x3C %x3D ; <=
patternOp = %x7E %x3D ; ~=
notPatternOp = %x21 %x7E %x3D ; !~=
dots = %x2E %x2E ; ..
AttrNameChar = unicodeNumber / unicodeLetter
AttrNameChar =/ %x5F ; _
AttrName = unicodeLetter *AttrNameChar
quotedStr = String ; "*char"
andOp = %x3B ; ;
orOp = %x7C ; |
LogicalOp = andOp / orOp 
```
